main event: A civilian in Old Town, Maine reported a reddish-orange UFO with no particular shape, observed for 2 minutes under fog and overcast conditions.
interesting points: The sighting took place on July 22, 1955, and lasted for 2 minutes.
The UFO was described as reddish-orange and of no particular shape.
The visibility at the time was reported to be 4 miles with fog and overcast conditions.
The witness, Mrs. Harriet Burr, was a reliable GOC observer and a housewife from Old Town, Maine.
The report concludes that there was insufficient data for evaluation.
sighted object: reddish-orange UFO with no particular shape
